DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase I trial to look at safety and how a patient's body will tolerate the treatment at different dosages.
DOC.brief_title: Study of hA20 (Humanized Anti-CD20) in Patients With CD20+ Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: CD20+ Bcell nonHodgkin's lymphoma (NHL) with measurable disease
